document_data.name: Farrish
document_data.mainbody: '''Farrish''' was a priest of [[Lathander]] in [[Freedale]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Farrish was described as kind and gentle.
document_data.Possessions: Of note, he had [[chain mail]] and a [[mace]].
document_data.Activities: He cast spells for money at the [[Temple of Lathander (Freedale)|Temple of Lathander]] to help with the upkeep. He would not do this for the malevolent or false, however.
document_data.Relationships: He was the master of [[Lordan]] the Pure, and would have a place of succor and healing for him as long as Lordan remained in good standing with their shared beliefs.
document_data.History: Farrish had built the Temple of Lathander in Freedale on his own, over the years.
